name: Shadowy Disguise
summary: You wrap yourself in shadow to change your appearance.
description:
You wrap yourself in shadow to change your appearance. You can cast illusory disguise as a 1st-level occult innate spell once per day. This spell gains the shadow trait.Traits

Fetchling: A creature with this trait is a member of the fetchling ancestry. Fetchlings were once human, but generations of life on the Shadow Plane have transformed them.
